netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic
Interface GridColumnRenderer

All Known Implementing Classes:
ComponentSecurityBean.PermissionsColumnRenderer
public interface GridColumnRenderer

This interface is used to add a custim renderer to a column When a GridPanel is rendering a column, e invokes the method render(...,...,...) and receive the text ou html regenerated and put in the GridColumn Exempla of usage: Bean Code: public GridColumnRenderer getMyRenderer() { return new GridColumnRenderer() { public String render( GridPanel grid, DataRecordConnector record, DataFieldConnector field ) { String oValue = field.getValue(); return "" + oValue + ""; } } }

Author:
jcarreira
